author: Neil Martin
comment: If like me you just want to run times this app is just the ticket. There no need to carry a phone. The free version does all you need... it's so good I bought the paid version, just to say thanks to the developer for his hard work.
title: Does the job really well

author: rohit bhosle
comment: Does what it says the best way compared to other interval timers
title: Superb

author: Miro Costa
comment: Just what I was looking for! I don't need the phone to run this app.
